title: Spells of Gold ISO
description:
Thought I should upload this in case anyone is looking for it. I think it's a great game and I couldn't find any other way to get it other than my physical copy.

My upload speed is slow and my PC might not be permanently online to seed, so please be patient and also seed.



Description from IGN:

Spells of Gold is a role-playing game with strong trade influence, released in Europe. The game is set in the world of fantasy, inhabited by humans, beasts, undead ones and other creatures. The universe of the game - Lokatrienn - is expansive and consists of a number of separate worlds. Each one has several cities, which represent isolated economic and political systems. The Hero is able to transit from one world to another through special space Gates, called Portals. His main activity is trade: buying goods in one town and selling or exchanging them in another. Spells of Gold features more than 2000 different types of weapons and armor, plenty of magic, and over 100 cities to visit.

Release Date: Europe Only
Genre: RPG
Publisher: Buka Entertainment
Developer: TBA
